bind.calculate: concat(concat(../patient_age_in_years, if(../patient_age_in_years = 1,' an et ',' ans et ')),concat(../patient_age_in_months mod 12, if((../patient_age_in_months mod 12) =1,' mois',' mois')))

concat(concat(../patient_age_in_years, if(../patient_age_in_years = 1,' year and ',' years and ')),concat(../patient_age_in_months mod 12, if((../patient_age_in_months mod 12) =1,' month old',' months old')))
if(../patient_sex = 'male' or ../patient_sex = 'homme' or ../patient_sex = 'Homme', 'Male', if(../patient_sex = 'female' or ../patient_sex = 'femme' or ../patient_sex = 'Femme', 'Female', ''))
if(../patient_sex = 'male' or ../patient_sex = 'homme' or ../patient_sex = 'Homme', 'Masculin', if(../patient_sex = 'female' or ../patient_sex = 'femme' or ../patient_sex = 'Femme', 'Féminin', ''))

if( /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_unable_drink_breastfeed = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_vomits_everything = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_convulsions = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_sleepy_unconscious = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_fever = 'yes' and /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_rdt_result = 'negative' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_fever = 'yes' and /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_rdt_given = 'no' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_stiff_neck = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_bulging_fontanelle = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_breathing_difficulty = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_cough_more_than_14days = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_subcostal_indrawing = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_wheezing = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_bloody_diarrhea = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_diarrhea_more_than_14_days = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_blood_in_stool = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_restless = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_drinks_hungrily = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_sunken_eyes = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_nutritional/c_has_edema = 'yes','true','false')

if(( /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_respiratory_rate_per_minute >= 50 and (../patient_age_in_months >= 2 and ../patient_age_in_months < 12)) or ( /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_respiratory_rate_per_minute >= 40 and (../patient_age_in_months >= 12 and ../patient_age_in_months < 60)), 'true','false')

if(../patient_age_in_months >= 2 and ../patient_age_in_months < 12 and /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_respiratory_rate_per_minute < 50 or ../patient_age_in_months >= 12 and ../patient_age_in_months < 60 and /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_respiratory_rate_per_minute < 40,'true','false')

if( /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_has_diarrhea = 'yes' and ( /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_bloody_diarrhea = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_diarrhea_more_than_14_days = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_blood_in_stool = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_restless = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_drinks_hungrily = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_sunken_eyes = 'yes'),'true','false')

if( /pcimne_register/is_danger_signs_referral = 'true' or /pcimne_register/is_fever_referal = 'true' or /pcimne_register/is_cough_cold_referal = 'true' or /pcimne_register/is_diarrhea_referal = 'true' or /pcimne_register/is_malnutrition_referal = 'true' or /pcimne_register/has_serious_malaria = 'true','true','false')

if( /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_fever = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_has_cough_cold = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_has_diarrhea = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_other_diseases/c_has_other_disease_problem = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/is_malnutrition_referal = 'true' or /pcimne_register/is_referred = 'true','true','false')

bind.relevant: /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_has_cough_cold = 'yes' and /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_breathing_difficulty = 'no' and /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_cough_more_than_14days = 'no' and /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_subcostal_indrawing = 'no' and /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_wheezing = 'no' and /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_respiratory_rate_per_minute != '' and /pcimne_register/has_pneumonia = 'true'

bind.calculate: if( /pcimne_register/child_vaccination/vaccination_followup/fields/is_birth_vaccine_ok ='true' and /pcimne_register/child_vaccination/vaccination_followup/fields/is_six_weeks_vaccine_ok ='true' and /pcimne_register/child_vaccination/vaccination_followup/fields/is_ten_weeks_vaccine_ok ='true' and /pcimne_register/child_vaccination/vaccination_followup/fields/is_forteen_weeks_vaccine_ok ='true' and /pcimne_register/child_vaccination/vaccination_followup/fields/is_nine_months_vaccine_ok ='true' and /pcimne_register/child_vaccination/vaccination_followup/fields/is_fifty_months_vaccine_ok ='true','false','true')

bind.relevant: /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_unable_drink_breastfeed = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_vomits_everything = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_convulsions = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_sleepy_unconscious = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_stiff_neck = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_bulging_fontanelle = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_breathing_difficulty = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_cough_more_than_14days = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_subcostal_indrawing = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_wheezing = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_bloody_diarrhea = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_diarrhea_more_than_14_days = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_blood_in_stool = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_restless = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_drinks_hungrily = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_sunken_eyes = 'yes'

/pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_unable_drink_breastfeed = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_vomits_everything = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_convulsions = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_danger_sign_control/c_sleepy_unconscious = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_stiff_neck = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_fever/c_has_bulging_fontanelle = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_breathing_difficulty = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_cough_more_than_14days = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_subcostal_indrawing = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_cough_cold/c_wheezing = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_bloody_diarrhea = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_diarrhea_more_than_14_days = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_blood_in_stool = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_restless = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_drinks_hungrily = 'yes' or /pcimne_register/c_diarrhea/c_sunken_eyes = 'yes'
